mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoCnsltDetailHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ CNSLT_SN , CNSLT_DETAIL_TURN , MOD_INFO_CD , HIST_DT , MOD_TP_CD , MOD_CONT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_CNSLT_DETAIL_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNSLT_SN = #{cnsltSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND CNSLT_DETAIL_TURN = #{cnsltDetailTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND MOD_INFO_CD = #{modInfoCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HIST_DT = #{histDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
